sentences.en: "You are rude and obtrusive, Mr Galbraith," said Tommy.
sentences.cn: “您粗暴无礼而且冒失莽撞，加尔布雷思先生，”汤米说道。
墙上的涂鸦同样引人注意.

sentences.en: I find the music in the bar very obtrusive.
sentences.cn: 我觉得酒吧里的音乐太吵人了.

sentences.en: Look at you . How obtrusive . It is no wonder you make mistakes.
sentences.cn: 看你楞乎乎的样子,不出错才怪.

sentences.en: Not obtrusive, go up pertly courtship, you can refuse for certain.
sentences.cn: 不要莽撞, 冒冒失失上去求爱, 你肯定会遭拒绝.

sentences.en: Not the less, however, came this importunately obtrusive sense of change.
sentences.cn: 然而, 那种起了变化的突出感觉仍然丝毫不减地纠缠着他.

sentences.en: So the search box is still flawed, but much less obtrusive.
sentences.cn: 所以说搜索栏还是有问题, 但是不那么烦人了.

sentences.en: The changes of the seasons are obtrusive on spots of this kind than amid woodland scenery.
sentences.cn: 在这种地方,四季景色的递?不如林区那样突出.

sentences.en: The factory is an obtrusive eyesore.
The modern king have become a vermiform appendix: useless when quiet ; when obtrusive, in danger of removal.
sentences.cn: 现代的君王已成了阑尾: 平时无用处,一旦突出, 即有被切除之虞.

sentences.en: The sofa would be less obtrusive in a paler colour.
sentences.cn: 沙发的颜色再浅一点就不那么扎眼了。

sentences.en: The waiters were friendly and not obtrusive.
sentences.cn: 服务员态度友好，举止得体。

sentences.en: There is nothing obtrusive about the old cottages.
sentences.cn: 古老的农舍丝毫不引人注目.

sentences.en: Try to wear a colour that is less obtrusive.
sentences.cn: 尽量穿得颜色别太显眼.

words.tran_cn: 突出的；强迫人的；冒失的

trans.tran_cn: （难看得）刺眼的，冒失的，莽撞的，强加于人的
trans.tran_en: noticeable in an unpleasant or annoying way
